note.p: Birth: Symington parish, Lanarkshire, Scotland (26 February 1796)
Death: His residence in Torrington Square, London (01 November 1851)
Career: Taught Mathematics at Royal Military College, Sandhurst (1823); Actuary to the Amicable Life Assurance Company, London (1833); member of Actuaries' Club
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Institute of Actuaries
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1850-1854 vol 6 pp 120-121
